From: Imelda Sebastian <imelda_sebastian@starkey.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 24 April 2025 10:25 AM
To: Greg Frost <greg@opticalandhearing.com.au>
Subject: RE: [External Sender] Marketing images and spiel for website
 
Hey Greg
 
Thanks for your patience.
 
Here is a link to our logos and Starkey’s hero products starkey.mediavalet.com/portals/STretailproductassets which you can download and use for your website.
 
For Edge AI, I have proposed the following product images:
 
  1. Edge AI RIC RT (Rechargeable)
Powered by the G2 Neuro Processor with a dedicated on-chip neural processing unit (NPU), and an all-new LE Audio streaming protocol, the Edge AI RIC RT’s advanced processing maintains up to 51 hours of battery life and is waterproof up to 1 meter – allowing patients to live easier, more connected lives. Edge AI’s Neuro Sound Technology 2.0 mimics the way a normal brain processes information.  It works like your brain’s hearing centre – helping you hear better in noise, in real time. It’s the closest thing to natural hearing – to help you stay connected to what matters most. 
    1. 30% better speech understanding
    2. Less strain and frustration during conversations
    3. Sound that adjusts to your environment – whenever you need it.
 
Edge AI gives you an edge you can count on:  up to 51 hours of battery life; waterproof*, sweatproof, and tough for daily life, modern and comfortable, discreet and easy to wear all day.
Life sounds better with an edge.
 
*Waterproof up to 1 meter. Rechargeable styles only.
 
 
  1. Edge AI RIC 312
Powered by the G2 Neuro Processor with a dedicated on-chip neural processing unit (NPU), and an all-new LE Audio streaming protocol, the Edge AI RIC 312’s advanced processing provides a zinc-air battery for an added layer of flexibility – allowing patients to live easier, more connected lives. Edge AI’s Neuro Sound Technology 2.0 mimics the way a normal brain processes information.  It works like your brain’s hearing centre – helping you hear better in noise, in real time. It’s the closest thing to natural hearing – to help you stay connected to what matters most. 
    1. 30% better speech understanding
    2. Less strain and frustration during conversations
    3. Sound that adjusts to your environment – whenever you need it.
 
 
 
  1. Signature Series CIC R NW (Rechargeable Non-Wireless)
The CIC rechargeable is the world’s smallest custom rechargeable hearing aid.  It’s also waterproof and has up to a 38-hour battery life.
Based on the industry’s most advanced processor and powered by our industry-leading Neuro Sound Technology, Starkey Signature Series delivers the size, performance and personalised fit that patients can only get from you.
It will forever change your perception of hearing aids
  1. Virtually invisible
  2. Transparent sound
  3. Custom fit for you
 
 
 
Please reach out if you need further assistance or information. We’re here to support you and your team 😊
 
 
 
Thanks!
 

Imelda Sebastian
Marketing Manager ANZ | Starkey Hearing Technologies Australia and New Zealand | Starkey
Suite W3C | Level 3, Building 2, 75 O’Riordan St | Sydney Corporate Park, Alexandria, NSW 2015
M: 0408 292 439 | Toll Free: 1800 024 985 | F: 02 9516 5775

full_threads.body:
I am sorry Rica

I thought I sent the following info through regarding product information, please see below. Have you changed the Phonak images to the new ones I sent with info attached??

For Edge AI, I have proposed the following product images:


  1. Edge AI RIC RT (Rechargeable)


Powered by the G2 Neuro Processor with a dedicated on-chip neural processing unit (NPU), and an all-new LE Audio streaming protocol, the Edge AI RIC RT's advanced processing maintains up to 51 hours of battery life and is waterproof up to 1 meter - allowing patients to live easier, more connected lives. Edge AI's Neuro Sound Technology 2.0 mimics the way a normal brain processes information. It works like your brain's hearing centre - helping you hear better in noise, in real time. It's the closest thing to natural hearing - to help you stay connected to what matters most.



    1. 30% better speech understanding

    2. Less strain and frustration during conversations

    3. Sound that adjusts to your environment - whenever you need it.




Edge AI gives you an edge you can count on: up to 51 hours of battery life; waterproof*, sweatproof, and tough for daily life, modern and comfortable, discreet and easy to wear all day.

Life sounds better with an edge.

*Waterproof up to 1 meter. Rechargeable styles only.


  1. Edge AI RIC 312


Powered by the G2 Neuro Processor with a dedicated on-chip neural processing unit (NPU), and an all-new LE Audio streaming protocol, the Edge AI RIC 312's advanced processing provides a zinc-air battery for an added layer of flexibility - allowing patients to live easier, more connected lives. Edge AI's Neuro Sound Technology 2.0 mimics the way a normal brain processes information. It works like your brain's hearing centre - helping you hear better in noise, in real time. It's the closest thing to natural hearing - to help you stay connected to what matters most.



    1. 30% better speech understanding

    2. Less strain and frustration during conversations

    3. Sound that adjusts to your environment - whenever you need it.





  1. Signature Series CIC R NW (Rechargeable Non-Wireless)


The CIC rechargeable is the world's smallest custom rechargeable hearing aid. It's also waterproof and has up to a 38-hour battery life.

Based on the industry's most advanced processor and powered by our industry-leading Neuro Sound Technology, Starkey Signature Series delivers the size, performance and personalised fit that patients can only get from you.

It will forever change your perception of hearing aids


  1. Virtually invisible

  2. Transparent sound

  3. Custom fit for you

Hi Greg,

I hope you're doing well!

Just a quick update regarding the Starkey page draft:
https://opticalandhearing.com.au/starkey-draft/

We’ve reviewed the files you provided and found images and the logo included. However, there was no written content or detailed product information attached.

At the moment, the page is using placeholder content until we receive the actual details.

Could you please share the written content and product information when convenient? Once we have everything, we’ll proceed with updating and finalizing the page.

Let me know if you need any assistance with this!
